mcq.statement: Which countries border the South China Sea?

options.a: China, Taiwan, Philippines, Malaysia, Brunei, Indonesia, Singapore, Vietnam
options.b: China, Taiwan, Japan, Malaysia, Brunei, Indonesia, Singapore, Vietnam
options.c: China, Taiwan, Philippines, Malaysia, Brunei, Indonesia, Singapore, Thailand
options.d: China, Taiwan, Philippines, Malaysia, Brunei, Indonesia, Singapore, Cambodia

mcq.one_liner: Countries bordering the South China Sea include **China, Taiwan, Philippines, Malaysia, Brunei, Indonesia, Singapore, and Vietnam**.
